name: Where did I put those?
description:
got Global Game Jam 2021

You are a squirrel. You need to bury as many nuts as possible in the autumn, so you have food to see you through the winter. They might be found and stolen, so spread them out! But make sure you can find them again later 

Controls: 

Move: WASD Left Stick 

Cam: Mouse Right Stick 

Jump: Space A 

Collect: E RB/LB 

Bury: F RT/LT 

Had no artist or it would've been very climbing heavy :D
